marklogic.body:
Trayvon Martin was dressed suspiciously, and a trusted man with a history of security claims he was suspiciously. This had little to do with race, despite the attempts of those hardly involved trying to warp this case.
Hoodies are Burned into an American watchman's mind. Rap videos, the Grim Reaper, countless security tape footage that shows hooded hoodlums committing crimes, the cultural impact is there. The "obvious" motive to those who are fueled by racial division (ironically those who claim to be trying to end it) is not Always as "black and white" as they expect. These racial "activists" are no different than the racists themselves, as they have been corrupted by the exact same mindset.
